summary: ON TWO DIFFERENT OCCASIONS, THE TAILGATE CAME DOWN UNEXPECTED WHILE DRIVING.  ON THE FIRST OCCASION, WE OCCURRED DAMAGE TO THE TAILGATE AND THE 5TH WHEEL.  PICTURES ARE ATTACHED.  WE WERE TOWING OUR FIFTH WHEEL TRAILER IN MOTION, TURNING AND DRIVING.  TWO OTHER PEOPLE IN VEHICLES TOLD US OUR TAILGATE WAS DOWN AND HAD DAMAGE TO OUR FIFTH WHEEL.  ONE HAPPENED IN SEPTEMBER AND THE OTHER IN NOVEMBER AGAIN FOR THE SECOND TIME.
